author: fMichaleczek
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

As a user I want PowerShell archive size should be more thin.

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

Doesn't include the Xml documentation in the final executable or disable it in the csproj
```
    <GenerateDocumentationFile>false</GenerateDocumentationFile>
    <PublishDocumentationFile>false</PublishDocumentationFile>
```
title: Remove Xml documentation in the final PowerShell app
